name: MobileMate
short_description: MobileMate is an open source video and audio converting tool customized on Tinycore Linux. It use Bash to glue open source tools such as Mplayer, FFmpeg(Libav), Zenity, Grep, Sed, etc..  It features as a self-booting tiny linux, can easy expand to your language, small size, easy to custom as your needs, etc..
summary: A video and audio converting tool customized on Tinycore Linux.
